description: Display of two advertisement signs to external elevation of building including associated external illumination (static).  The signs will be located on the Dufferin Street and Errol Street elevations of the building.
decision_conditions: REASON: The advertisement signs, by reason of their design, materials, scale, positioning and illumination is considered to cause demonstrable harm to the appearance of the building which is of significant visual interest and detract from the visual amenity, character and appearance of the conservation area contrary to PPG19 (Advertisements), policies Env11 (Advertisements and signs), D1 (Overall design), D3 (Site planning), D11 (Alterations and extensions) and D22 (New Development) of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002, policy CS9 (Protecting and Enhancing Islington's Built and Historic Environment) of the Core Strategy 2011 and guidance contained within the St Lukes Conservation Area Design Guidelines 2002 and Islington Urban Design Guide 2006.
